AUTHOR: Twentysix
DESCRIPTION: Allows for interaction with cleverbot.com through mention/command
NAME: Cleverbot
INSTALL_MSG:
Needs to be setup with an API key first. See `[p]cleverbot apikey`
[p]cleverbot <text>` to talk with cleverbot.
`@Mention <text>` works too.
`[p]cleverbot toggle` disables replies by mention.
